text.section: This section applies only in Dorchester County.
The Board of License Commissioners may issue a 1-day wine tasting (WT) alcoholic beverages license.

section.section: A WT license may be issued only to a holder of a beer, wine and liquor (BWL) license, a beer and wine (BW) license, or a Class A wine (W) license.

A WT license permits the consumption of wine for tasting or sampling if:
The licensee is authorized to sell the wine; and
A consideration for the wine is not charged or exacted from the consumer.

text.section:
A person may consume wine covered by a WT license in a quantity not exceeding:
1 ounce from a single brand; and
4 ounces from all brands in a single day.
The fee for a WT license is $25 per day.
The Board of License Commissioners may not require the publication of an application for a WT license before granting the license.
